title: Complete Web Development Bootcamp
description: Master full-stack web development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Build real-world projects and deploy professional applications.

title: Digital Marketing Mastery
description: Learn SEO, social media marketing, content creation, email marketing, and paid advertising strategies to grow your business online.

title: Data Science with Python
description: Dive into data analysis, machine learning, and visualization using Python, pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, and Matplotlib.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Master user interface and user experience design principles, wireframing, prototyping, and design tools like Figma and Adobe XD.

title: Business Strategy & Leadership
description: Develop strategic thinking, leadership skills, team management, and business planning techniques for modern organizations.

title: Photography Masterclass
description: Learn composition, lighting, editing, and storytelling techniques to capture stunning photographs with any camera equipment.

title: Spanish Language Complete Course
description: From beginner to advanced Spanish conversation, grammar, vocabulary, and cultural understanding with native speakers.

title: Personal Finance & Investment
description: Master budgeting, saving, investing, retirement planning, and building long-term wealth through smart financial decisions.

title: Yoga & Mindfulness Practice
description: Improve physical flexibility, mental clarity, and emotional balance through guided yoga sessions and mindfulness meditation.

title: Music Production & Audio Engineering
description: Create professional music tracks using DAW software, mixing techniques, mastering, and sound design principles.
